item.title: PM Keir Starmer has labelled Reform UK's proposed policy of scrapping indefinite leave to remain as "racist" and "immoral". A Question Time audience member asks: “Why are concerns about immigration branded ‘far right’?”. #Labour #KeirStarmer #Conservative

item.title: Police say they believe the attacker from Thursday's Manchester synagogue attack was 35-year-old Jihad Al-Shamie, a British citizen of Syrian descent. He was shot dead by officers at the scene. #Manchester #Crumpsall #GreaterManchesterPolice #GMP #Synagog
